features.name: Two Single Beds.
features.description: Two single beds (90cm x 200cm) for a comfortable stay.

features.name: Convertible Couch Bed.
features.description: Built-in window sofa nook converts into a single bed for extra sleeping space.

features.name: Ensuite Bathroom with a View.
features.description: Full-size bathtub overlooking the pool, shower, and vanity sink for a relaxing experience.

features.name: Workspace & Storage.
features.description: Office desk with chair, built-in wardrobes for a productive and organized stay.

features.name: Climate Control & Comfort.
features.description: Equipped with air conditioning and a dehumidifier for an optimal stay.
